title: An American time capsule
creator_credit: Braverman Productions, Pyramid Films and Charles Braverman
brief_description: Condenses 200 years of American history into three volatile minutes. The film is a chronological capsule of 1,300 visuals (paintings, still photographs, newspaper headlines, early newsreels, posters and political cartoons). No commentary - music “Beat that drum” by Sandy Nelson.
creator_credit_for_label: Braverman Productions, Pyramid Films and Charles Braverman
